title: Why Not Use Policy Evaluation?
formulas: V_k+1(s) <= SUM over s' of T(s, π(s), s') * [R(s, π(s), s') + γV_π(s')] + γV_π(s')
summary: The slide discusses the limitations of using policy evaluation in reinforcement learning, specifically the need for transition and reward functions to update the value function. It poses a key question about how to update the value function without knowing these functions.
